name: AUTO
description: AutoRujira is the automation layer powering Rujira, enabling both humans and AI agents to run workflows that combine onchain and offchain actions in a fully automated way. Users can discover, run, and eventually create automations for staking, claiming rewards, executing bids, managing trades, and more — all without writing code. By leveraging AI where it truly adds value — like in discovering the right strategies or making offchain decisions — AutoRujira ensures a smarter, more intuitive automation experience. Each workflow is carefully curated for safety, clarity, and performance, so users can automate with confidence.
